revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Ruins of Alph |image = [[File:Ruins of Alph.png]] |caption = A map of the Ruins of Alph. |tokens = 3000 |location = South of Violet City, on Route 32 }} The '''Ruins of Alph''' is a dungeon in [[Johto]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health (Pokémon) !! Base Health (Boss) !! Egg Steps Given |- | General || 60,600 || 260,000 || 5 |}
===Pokémon===
* Natu * Wooper * Quagsire * Smeargle * Magikarp * Poliwag * Poliwhirl * Unown A, L, P, or H (boss)
===Items===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 25% |- | [[XClick|xClick]] || 50% |- | [[Item Magnet]] || 25% |}
